articles.title: White Sox aren’t done with fast-moving offseason - Chicago Sun-Times
articles.description: The White Sox wasted no time checking off their top two needs this offseason, trading for right-hander Lance Lynn and signing right fielder Adam Eaton in the first two days of baseball’s “virtual winter meetings” this week.
